text.author: Santa Barbara Corpus of Spoken American English (ed. John W. Du Bois)
text.title: Actual Blacksmithing
text.summary: Mae Lynne tells about her experiences studying horse anatomy and blacksmithing in college in order to be able to take care of horses.
